data.trans: Ở trong nhà, không ra ngoài
data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ ở trong nhà và thư giãn tối nay.
data.en_hint: I will stay in and chill tonight.
data.content_game_1: I will stay in and chill tonight.
data.answer_en_hint: I will stay in and chill tonight.

data.trans_hint: Mỗi một đứa trẻ đều xứng đáng được nuôi dưỡng trong tình yêu thương và hòa bình để trở thành những công dân hạnh phúc khi trưởng thành.
data.en_hint: Every child deserves to be brought up in love and peace to grow up into happy citizens.
data.content_game_1: Every child deserves to be brought up in love and peace to grow up into happy citizens.
data.answer_en_hint: Every child deserves to be brought up in love and peace to grow up into happy citizens.

data.trans: Bị cuốn theo (một bộ phim, một trận bóng)
data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều đứa trẻ bị cuốn theo các chương trình quảng cáo khi được bố mẹ bón cho ăn.
data.en_hint: Lots of young children are carried away watching TV commercials when being fed by their parents.
data.content_game_1: Lots of young children are carried away watching TV commercials when being fed by their parents.
data.answer_en_hint: Lots of young children are carried away watching TV commercials when being fed by their parents.

data.trans_hint: Chris giúp mẹ một tay khi bà đang làm vườn.
data.en_hint: Chris gave his mother a hand when she was doing gardening.
data.content_game_1: Chris gave his mother a hand when she was doing gardening.
data.answer_en_hint: Chris gave his mother a hand when she was doing gardening.

data.trans_hint: Bố mẹ tôi sẽ đi nghỉ mát ở Phú Quốc trong một tuần và tôi sắp sửa được ở nhà một mình.
data.en_hint: My parents are going to go away for one week to Phu Quoc island, and I'm about to stay home alone.
data.content_game_1: My parents are going to go away for one week to Phu Quoc island, and I'm about to stay home alone.
data.answer_en_hint: My parents are going to go away for one week to Phu Quoc island, and I'm about to stay home alone.

data.trans_hint: Con trai cô ấy chưa từng biết đến quả Mít, nên nó hỏi cô ấy đó là cái gì.
data.en_hint: Her son had never heard of jackfruit, so he asked her what it was.
data.content_game_1: Her son had never heard of jackfruit, so he asked her what it was.
data.answer_en_hint: Her son had never heard of jackfruit, so he asked her what it was.

data.trans_hint: Tom là một cậu bé hiếu động, nên mẹ câu ta luôn phải để mắt đến cậu ta không ngừng.
data.en_hint: Tom is a rambunctious boy, so his mom has to keep an eye on him all the time.
data.content_game_1: Tom is a rambunctious boy, so his mom has to keep an eye on him all the time.
data.answer_en_hint: Tom is a rambunctious boy, so his mom has to keep an eye on him all the time.

data.trans: Thả ra ngoài (vật nuôi, thú cưng)
data.trans_hint: Ba tôi thường thả lũ gà ra vườn kiếm ăn vào mỗi buổi chiều.
data.en_hint: My father often lets the chickens out to find food in the garden every afternoon.
data.content_game_1: My father often lets the chickens out to find food in the garden every afternoon.
data.answer_en_hint: My father often lets the chickens out to find food in the garden every afternoon.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi cân nhắc kỹ, Sarah đã quyết định chuyển đi chỗ khác để tìm một nhà trọ tốt hơn.
data.en_hint: After weighing up the pros and cons, Sarah decided to move away to find a better rent house.
data.content_game_1: After weighing up the pros and cons, Sarah decided to move away to find a better rent house.
data.answer_en_hint: After weighing up the pros and cons, Sarah decided to move away to find a better rent house.

data.trans_hint: Là một CEO bận rộn, bố cô ấy thường xuyên phải đi lại với những chuyến công tác.
data.en_hint: As a busy CEO, her father is always on the road with his business trips.
data.content_game_1: As a busy CEO, her father is always on the road with his business trips.
data.answer_en_hint: As a busy CEO, her father is always on the road with his business trips.

data.trans_hint: Sunny rất mong ngóng những ngày cuối tuần lúc mà bố mẹ thường đưa em đi chơi ở sở thú.
data.en_hint: Sunny always looks forward to weekends when her parents often take her out to the zoo.
data.content_game_1: Sunny always looks forward to weekends when her parents often take her out to the zoo.
data.answer_en_hint: Sunny always looks forward to weekends when her parents often take her out to the zoo.
